body:
6cd016f adds additional NaCl builders at version 44.0.2403.157 to the Kubernetes builders. We can easily add support for other versions if necessary.

@bradfitz, you or someone with access to the symbolic-datum-552 GCP project will need to run `make prod` in `build/env/linux-x86-nacl` (and re-deploy the coordinator to the prod farmer) for this to take effect.
